name: Zabeen Yusuf Nur
review: Such service platforms are available in other countries. I’ve personally used those when I was abroad. I’m very pleased that such a portal is available here in Bangladesh as well. Thank you Sheba.xyz.

name: Zeba Fariba
review: It was my marriage and wasn’t getting schedule from any beauty parlor.So, I downloaded Sheba.xyz app and found that it has all of my requirements. The beautician arrived in time and was really amazing. Thank you.

name: Arif Ur Rahman
review: Initially I was reluctant. I wasn’t sure how an online platform would be.sheba.xyz was able to complete the job just as I imagined it to be. Thanks to them, they made it possible.

name: Saima Ahmad
review: Sheba.xyz services are very helpful for working women like me.They were on time as per the schedule to provide the service, and I’m very satisfied with their quality of service.
